snippet: Federal prosecutors say they are likely to file a new indictment against Rajat K. Gupta, possibly adding new criminal charges in the insider trading case against the former head of McKinsey & Company.
abstract: Federal prosecutors say they are likely to file a new indictment against Rajat K. Gupta, possibly adding new criminal charges in the insider trading case against the former head of McKinsey & Company.
lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors said Thursday that they were likely to file a new indictment against Rajat K. Gupta, possibly adding new criminal charges in the insider trading case against the former head of the consulting firm McKinsey & Company.

headline.main: New Charges Possible in Insider Case Against Gupta
